name: Slime Splash
description: Deals light damage to one enemy.

name: Burning Slime
description: Deals fire damage and applies Burn.

name: Arrow Shot
description: Shoots an arrow at a single enemy.

name: Crippling Shot
description: Deals damage and applies DEF Down.

name: Shadow Bolt
description: Dark magic attack on a single enemy.

name: Darkened Gift
description: Applies ATK Up to all allies.

name: Smoke Veil
description: Applies SPD Up to all allies.

name: Crimson Wave
description: Unleash a wave of blood magic dealing damage and stealing HP.

name: Frost Prison
description: Encase enemy in ice, dealing damage and reducing SPD.

name: Seismic Slam
description: Slam the ground causing AoE damage and stun chance.

name: Divine Shield
description: Grant DEF Up to all allies.

name: Venomous Fang
description: Bite dealing damage with high poison chance.

name: Temporal Shift
description: Manipulate time to boost ally SPD.

name: Void Lance
description: Pierce through enemy defenses ignoring DEF.

name: Hellfire Rain
description: Rain fire on all enemies with burn.

name: Soul Drain
description: Drain enemy soul dealing massive damage.

name: Glacial Spike
description: Launch ice spike dealing heavy damage.

name: Holy Judgment
description: Divine attack dealing massive light damage.

name: Plague Cloud
description: Release toxic cloud poisoning all enemies.

name: Meteor Strike
description: Call down meteor for massive AoE damage.

name: Shadow Dance
description: Multiple quick strikes on random enemies.

name: Earthquake
description: Shake the earth damaging all foes.

name: Blessing of Light
description: Bless allies with ATK and DEF boost.

name: Blood Ritual
description: Sacrifice HP for massive ATK boost.

name: Cursed Touch
description: Touch enemy to curse and weaken.

name: Phoenix Rebirth
description: Revive with flames and heal allies.

name: Blizzard
description: Freeze all enemies in ice storm.

name: Spirit Bond
description: Link spirits to boost all stats.

name: Mind Break
description: Shatter enemy mind reducing all stats.

name: Death Mark
description: Mark enemy for death increasing damage taken.

name: Shockwave
description: Pulse of energy knocking back foes.

name: Berserk
description: Enter rage state boosting ATK massively.

name: Sacrifice
description: Give HP to boost ally power.

name: Dark Pact
description: Make deal with darkness for power.
